title: Keroro Gunsou Movie 1
title_jp: 超劇場版 ケロロ軍曹
synopsis: Sergeant Keroro and his four subordinates came from the planet Keron to the Earth to conquer. However, without notice, they began to enjoy the life on the Earth. Keroro was supposed to stay with Hitana to get the chance to conquer the Earth, but he became friend with Hinata's son, Fuyuki.
